results.description: The single market is key to Europe’s place in the global economy. It can drive growth and jobs, but barriers remain in vital sectors including services and digital. results.description: The UK reached an agreement with Iran on its nuclear programme on 14 July 2015. This will impose strict limits and inspections, giving us confidence that the programme is exclusively peaceful, in exchange for phased sanctions relief. Our focus is now on swift and full implementation, to make sure that a nuclear weapon remains beyond Iran's reach.
results.title: Iran's nuclear programme
